data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Quiché, Guatemala honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quiché, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Quiché, Guatemala a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 188 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Quiché, Guatemala.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Quiché, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 238,558 believers in Quiché, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, help 191 new simple churches start among the 955,700 people in the state of Quiché, Guatemala. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Quiché, Guatemala to the gospel today.

data.section_summary:
the state of Quiché, Guatemala has a population of 955,700.

We estimate Quiché has 238,558 people who might know Jesus, 672,266 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 44,876 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 238,558 believers in Quiché to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
